Koreans in Japan to Donate Relief Fund to Ryongchon Inhabitants
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan to Donate Relief Fund to Ryongchon Inhabitants 
    Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan are conducting a brisk mass campaign to help out of ardent compatriotism the inhabitants in Ryongchon, North Phyongan Province recover from the damage caused by the explosion at Ryongchon Railway Station and bring their life to normal at an early date.
 Thanks to this sincere support of the officials of Chongryon and the Korean businessmen in Japan the Secretariat of the Chongryon Fund-raising Campaign for Assisting Compatriots in Ryongchon to Recover from the Damage on April 28 decided to donate 50 million yen as the first installment of the relief fund to be sent to the DPRK Flood Damage Rehabilitation Committee.

Congratulatory Message to President of Seychelles
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to President of Seychelles
    Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on April 27 sent a congratulatory message to James Alix Michel on his election as president of the Republic of Seychelles.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow stronger, the message wished him great success in his responsible work for the stability and prosperity of the country

Congratulations to Senegalese Prime Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Senegalese Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Macky Sall upon his appointment as prime minister of Senegal.
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message sincerely wished him great success in his responsible work.
